Facsimile Images

Πίδοσσα Πάρωνος
τοῦ Ἐπιάνακτος

Apparatus criticus

Text of Gualtherus and Franz; Kaibel: [..]πιδος Σα[ρ]α[πί]ωνος. The suggestion of a lacuna at the start of the line is entirely speculative on the part of Kaibel.
2: Gualtherus marks a '.' between the two words, but whether this is intended to signify an interpunct or a missing character is unclear.

translation

commentary

The text appears to be on a relief, possibly funerary, of which Gualtherus provides a drawing. There is no record of autopsy after Gualtherus and it appears to be lost. Kaibel's attempt to suggest a comprehensible text ignores the presentation of Gualtherus; Kaibel's reference to Gualtherus fails to indicate that the text is in the addenda, p.100, not the main sequence.
